footer.gob_nayarit: Government of the State of Nayarit

inicio.titulo-resena: National and International Federation of Nayaritas in the United States
inicio.texto-resena: It is a non-profit organization that represents the Nayarit community abroad. Composed of 35 clubs from different municipalities, its mission is to support and promote the well-being of Nayaritas both in the United States and in Mexico. With a strong commitment to its people, FENINE-USA works to strengthen cultural ties, provide assistance, and foster the development of Nayarit communities in both countries.

ubicacion.direccion: 514 W Anaheim St, Wilmington, CA 90744, United States
